issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
HDFS-8312 introduced {{Options.Rename.TO_TRASH}} to differentiate the movement to trash and other renames for permission checks.

When Options.Rename.NONE is passed also TO_TRASH is considered for rename and wrong permissions are checked for rename.
fields.summary: Options.Rename.To_TRASH is considered even when Options.Rename.NONE is specified
